gcci.text: H100 lease rates at $3.22/hr reflect easing but tight supply as Blackwell ramps and capex surges, while 2.5D packaging capacity expansion provides a path to balanced inventories by 2026.

gtpi.text: DeepSeek’s $1.30/1M input token pricing ignites an API price war, rewarding efficient architectures like MoE and distillation while compressing margins across the model market.

gagl.text: AI’s 120 TWh annual load (~13.7 GW average) stresses power grids, accelerating adoption of nuclear (SMRs) and firm clean PPAs to sustain growth without inflating carbon intensity.

aipi.text: Macro sentiment is cautiously optimistic as falling unit costs and steady capex offset pricing pressure and grid constraints, with growth tethered to sustainable power solutions and disciplined returns.
